meanings.definition: Resembling or characteristic of a lout.
meanings.sent1: The man's loutish behavior at the party embarrassed his friends.
meanings.sent2: She found his loutish manners off-putting.
meanings.sent3: Despite his loutish ways, he always remembered to say please and thank you.
meanings.sent4: Her loutish attitude was like a dark cloud hanging over the gathering.
meanings.sent5: The loutish appearance of the unkempt garden made the neighbors frown.

meanings.definition: Behaving in a rude or aggressive manner.
meanings.sent1: The loutish comments from the audience disrupted the speaker's presentation.
meanings.sent2: His loutish behavior towards the waitress was unacceptable.
meanings.sent3: Even though he was loutish, his friends knew he had a kind heart.
meanings.sent4: The loutish driver cut off other cars on the road, causing chaos.
meanings.sent5: Her loutish outburst left everyone in the room stunned.
